com.ibm.xmi.framework
Class DeclarationWriterAdapterImpl

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.ibm.xmi.framework.WriterAdapterImpl
        |
        +--com.ibm.xmi.framework.DeclarationWriterAdapterImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
DeclarationWriterAdapter, WriterAdapter
public class DeclarationWriterAdapterImpl
extends WriterAdapterImpl
implements DeclarationWriterAdapter

This class implements the DeclarationWriterAdapter interface, using the framework object model classes to get the data required by the framework.

The framework has not been optimized, so the methods in this interface are called repeatedly. If it is expensive to implement a method, you should consider caching the information that is returned so future calls to the method will work more quickly.
